title: Spiced lemon loaf cake
ingredients: ['225g unsalted butter, room temperature', '150g caster sugar', '3 eggs', '150g plain flour', '2 tablespoons dried milk powder', '1 tablespoon golden syrup', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon ground mace']
